info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.Utils
public class Utils extends Object

      lower - a lower bound

      Process the selector's keys. The Selector.select() method should have been already invoked.
      Parameters:
      selector - the selector
      sendOp - an operation to do with the writable key
      recOp - an operation to do with the readable key
